com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameWorld, IGameWorldHeroInputs, DummyEnemyFeature
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatWorld, SurvivalWorld

    public abstract class GameWorld
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameWorld, IGameWorldHeroInputs, DummyEnemyFeature
    Base Class that functions represents a generic game world, with it's logic, physics, and characters

        public void moveHeroHorizontal(double heroXMovement)
        Moves the hero on the X axis. The argument is the intensity of the speed of the max hero velocity
        Specified by:
        moveHeroHorizontal in interface IGameWorldHeroInputs
        Parameters:
        heroXMovement - should go from -1.0 to 1.0, which makes the hero move to the left and right respectively, and 0.0 stops the hero

      • heroJump

        Specified by:
